'''Duda Kyat''' is the mother of [[Arthur Kyat]].

==History==
Duda's son, Arthur, was in end-stage liver failure due to primary sclerosing cholangitis. He was severely jaundiced and unable to leave his hospital bed. After 137 days on the transplant list, Nick came to check on him and invited him to a basketball game. His mother was upset, because she said the hope made things harder. Then Nick revealed that a liver had become available and was going to Arthur. Once the liver was retrieved, Nick transplanted it into Arthur. After the surgery was over, Nick told Duda that he would be walking around in a few weeks. She asked Nick how to thank the family that had just lost their loved one.
